name: awesoome-api
description: API for awesome lists. Scraped from awesome list.

scripts.dev: nodemon -w src --ignore db.json --ignore last-updated.json --exec "babel-node src --presets es2015,stage-0"
scripts.deploy: rsync --progress -e "ssh $npm_package_config_remote_ssh" -rlpt --compress --omit-dir-times --exclude .git --exclude dist --exclude node_modules --exclude src/db.json --exclude src/last-updated.json --delete ./ :$npm_package_config_remote_dir && ssh $npm_package_config_remote_ssh "cd $npm_package_config_remote_dir && yarn && pm2 start npm --name $npm_package_config_process_name -- start"
scripts.deploy-restart: rsync --progress -e "ssh $npm_package_config_remote_ssh" -rlpt --compress --omit-dir-times --exclude .git --exclude dist --exclude node_modules --exclude src/db.json --exclude src/last-updated.json --delete ./ :$npm_package_config_remote_dir && ssh $npm_package_config_remote_ssh "cd $npm_package_config_remote_dir && yarn && pm2 restart $npm_package_config_process_name"

author: Jason Miller <jason@developit.ca>
